content.en: Fault Tolerant Multiprocessors: Researchers are exploring ways to add fault tolerance in multiprocessor architectures using algorithm-based fault tolerance (ABFT) systems. They are investigating the design, maintenance, and analysis of ABFT systems to ensure minimal performance degradation. Additionally, they are developing adaptive fault diagnosis algorithms and probabilistic fault diagnosis and repair algorithms to achieve correct diagnosis and repair of faulty processors in multiprocessor systems.
content.da: Fejltolerante Multiprocessorer: Forskere undersøger måder at tilføje fejltolerance i multiprocessor-arkitekturer ved hjælp af algoritmebaserede fejltolerancesystemer (ABFT). De undersøger design, vedligeholdelse og analyse af ABFT-systemer for at sikre minimal præstationsforringelse. Derudover udvikler de adaptive fejldiagnosealgoritmer og probabilistiske fejldiagnose- og reparationsalgoritmer for at opnå korrekt diagnose og reparation af fejlagtige processorer i multiprocessorsystemer.
